message: Well it doesnt, but, if you beat up a man that is a woman imo it isn't as bad as beating up a born woman who changed into a man.....not from the non tolerant hate basher point of view, I don't care what people want to do with their lives, as a combat sport enthusiast.....like the ufc fighter crisis cyborg who is a man who transformation to a woman and fights natural women in the ufc......I think it is wrong......and I don't care where she wants to live or date ot go to the bathroom or whatever, and I'll admit ignorance to how it happens but if u need to take hormones to be whatever you want to be, u shouldn't get to be a professional athlete, combat sports especially

Used the right way, spraying unlawful protesters and rioters with water is a great way to get them to disperse. If such things happen at night in just about any time of year, the protesters and rioters will go home because they are cold and wet. A trained individual can spray water in an arc similar to a rainbow. The water will fall like heavy rain and not injure anyone.

All joking aside, the true lesson in all of this, is seeing what accountability looks like. Steve Harvey did not have to stay and apologize, but he did and he owned up to his error. He quickly acted on the error and made what was wrong to a right. Steve Harvey corrected it before he was even told by the production company during the show last night. Interesting, I just watched this yesterday, prior to the pageant, on Oprah's Super Soul Sunday with Bren√© Brown talking about what is trust, and accountability was one of the traits. How can you trust someone if that person cannot be accountable for his or her own actions? The producers of the pageant immediately forgave Steve Harvey for what he did because on his own he corrected the wrong and took accountability for his human era, therefore this production company will support him through this matter. And most likely Steve Harvey will continue to work with the organization in the future. Now that's all over, let's get back to our regularly schedule program. Steve Harvey TV #accountability #trust #apologyaccepted #MissUniverse #HumanError #ahHaMoment #fyahfly

Liz, so you own a dog? You do know that dogs were meant to be wild animals as well, right? They are descendants of wolves and have been domesticated and crossbred over generations. It's the same concept here. Except that this is in addition to everyone else's points about these animals knowing nothing except Sea World. And sea world donating millions of hours and dollars to save marine life. You just want something to complain about and YOU are the troll.
